name: EarthBuilder
description:
Created for Epic Mega Jam 2019 by one person. No sounds.

Description

You are a professional builder of the Earth, all of humanity is waiting for your accomplishments. Do not fail, because the whole world is in your hands!

Controls:
Spacebar - Launch spaceship to space (Start game)
Mouse - look around
RMB+Mouse - Rotate around the earth
LMB - Interact
Mouse wheel - Rotate pieces (only with placed pieces)
F1 - Show / Hide tooltip
Esc - Exit game
